tattoos.name: Touch-up
tattoos.description: Touch up on apprentice tattoos. First touch up is free, after one touch up it is $50 per touch up on small tattoos.

tattoos.name: Portrait
tattoos.description:
A portrait tattoo is a realistic tattoo of a face. It can be illustrative, realistic, black and grey, or color. Prices may vary depending on color and design, portraits start at 5x5 inches 

$500 minimum price goes up by size

tattoos.name: Thigh tattoo
tattoos.description: Generally thigh tattoos are hip to knee or slightly smaller. Either on the side or front of the thighs. Prices are subject to change depending on size, color, design. They start at $500 and go up in price depending on size and detail.

tattoos.name: Spine Tattoo
tattoos.description: This is a tattoo that goes down the center of the spine. Prices are subject to change depending on size, color, design.

tattoos.name: Semipermanent Brow Services
tattoos.description: Ombre Brows, Nano brows and powder brow services offered

tattoos.name: 4x4 Small tattoo
tattoos.description: 4x4 Small tattoo, price starts at $200 and may vary based on size and detail

tattoos.name: Anime Tattoos
tattoos.description: Anime tattoos start at $150 and go up price based on size and detail

tattoos.name: Finger Tattoos
tattoos.description: Finger tattoos start $100 prices vary by size and detail

tattoos.name: Hand Tattoo
tattoos.description: Hand tattoos start at $150 and go up in price based on size and detail

tattoos.name: Cover Up
tattoos.description: A cover up is a complete covering of a tattoo already on your body. Cover ups may take multiple sessions and prices vary drastically depending on what is being covered and design and color of new tattoo. Cover ups start at $250 no matter how small.

tattoos.name: 6x6 inch tattoo
tattoos.description: These tattoos can be up to six inches, Prices start at $350 may vary depending on color and design.

tattoos.name: 2x2 Inch tattoo
tattoos.description: Starting at $100 for any tattoo 2X2 inches or smaller

piercings.name: Tongue Piercing
piercings.description: Basic tongue piercing with jewelry included
